feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.33
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for markdown resolution
  • Refactored for a single transaction when deleting an invoice.
  • Update default payment method if current is deleted.
  • Checks for migrations
  • Updated lock file for dependencies.
  • v5.11.33 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10601

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.32...v5.11.33

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.34
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for recurring due dates
  • Adjustments for the elegant design
  • Adjustments for last login
  • Fixes for recurring invoice filters
  • Add checks for job_batches
  • Update dependencies for Braintree
  • Add no overflow when calculating due dates in recurring dates tests
  • v5.11.34 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10608

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.33...v5.11.34

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.35
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Exclude vendor folder from chmod by @benbrummer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10602
  • Add missing fields to FatturaPA by @AlessandroSechi in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10610
  • Fixes for timing of applying credit number by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10629
  • v5.11.35 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10631

New Contributors

  • @AlessandroSechi made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10610

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.34...v5.11.35

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.36
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Revert "exclude vendor folder from chmod" by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10632
  • v5.11.36 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10633

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.35...v5.11.36

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.37
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Significant changes around PDF generation, removing multiple codepaths.

  • Updates across all designs to improve alignment and overflow conditions.

  • v5.11.37 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10636

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.36...v5.11.37
